title: 780. Scott Pioli on Scouting Days with Patriots & Bill Belichick
itunes:title: 780. Scott Pioli on Scouting Days with Patriots & Bill Belichick
description:
Daniel Jeremiah is back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. On this special episode, former NFL general manager and NFL Media analyst Scott Pioli joins as he discusses his time in the scouting department with the Patriots, touches on what we learned from the Rams, emphasizes the importance of serving the coaching staff as a general manager, and much more.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
